items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
implicitMods: +2 to Level of Socketed Minion Gems
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
And I'd do it again in an instant.

socketedItems.secDescrText: Summon a Holy Relic that stays near you. When you hit an enemy with an attack, the Holy Relic triggers a nova spell, with a very short cooldown, that deals physical damage to enemies and grants life regeneration to allies. This life regeneration is higher when applied to minions.

80% more Minion Movement Speed
Holy Relic's Nova Skill grants 165.6 Life regenerated per second to Allies

socketedItems.secDescrText: Casting once reserves mana to carry a banner which increases the accuracy of nearby allies, and physical damage taken by nearby enemies. You cannot have multiple banners at the same time.
